name: Thorns of a Black Rose
description:
This Story was created for the IGMC game Jam of 2018.

Have you every told a lie?  Of course you have, you're only human.  But, how far would you take a lie?  Would you hurt others in your lie just to be with the person you love?

This game is based on a true story on how someone would lie to marry the man of their dreams.  

Inspiration:

When I was a child, my mom would take me to my grandmother's house when she would go to work.  One thing that my grandma had playing in the background was her soap operas.  Years ahead, when I recently visited her, she still had her soap operas playing in the background.  This inspired me to essentially create my own soap opera.  This short story has melodrama, lies, deceit, plot twists and a ending with a cliff hanger.
